wybug_title: 某人才网存在sql注入大量用户信息泄露
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-12：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-22：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-01：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-11：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-26：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  某人才网站存在post注入漏洞http://**.**.**.**/bys/dacx.aspx这个url存在post注入
POST /bys/dacx.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:38.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/38.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://**.**.**.**/bys/dacx.aspxCookie: CNZZDATA257989=cnzz_eid%3D1002435642-1443664989-%26ntime%3D1443664989; Hm_lvt_c28f8ffa76ed60cdd18a229a05594f04=1443667342; Hm_lpvt_c28f8ffa76ed60cdd18a229a05594f04=1443667342Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 398__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUKLTUxNDE3ODM4OQ9kFgJmD2QWAgIHD2QWAgIBD2QWAgICD2QWAgIBDzwrABEBARAWABYAFgBkGAEFIGN0bDAwJENvbnRlbnRQbGFjZUhvbGRlcjEkZ3ZCaWFvD2dk%2BQegMLD9zTWwcSsu5UvSlsu1WZ82mxGkmO1G%2BuhshpQ%3D&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWAwLPx%2Fe%2FDAKIpPqvBgKHjILLAWWW9urjdL98sj0%2BNGpoNykbIBrUT3bYERyVSxxNuFUo&ctl00%24ContentPlaceHolder1%24tbXingming=hua&ctl00%24ContentPlaceHolder1%24buChaxun=%E6%9F%A5%E8%AF%A2
上述为post请求保存成txt丢入sqlmap -r  txt文件发现存在sql注入   漏洞证明：  
POST /bys/dacx.aspx HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:38.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/38.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://**.**.**.**/bys/dacx.aspxCookie: CNZZDATA257989=cnzz_eid%3D1002435642-1443664989-%26ntime%3D1443664989; Hm_lvt_c28f8ffa76ed60cdd18a229a05594f04=1443667342; Hm_lpvt_c28f8ffa76ed60cdd18a229a05594f04=1443667342Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 398__VIEWSTATE=%2FwEPDwUKLTUxNDE3ODM4OQ9kFgJmD2QWAgIHD2QWAgIBD2QWAgICD2QWAgIBDzwrABEBARAWABYAFgBkGAEFIGN0bDAwJENvbnRlbnRQbGFjZUhvbGRlcjEkZ3ZCaWFvD2dk%2BQegMLD9zTWwcSsu5UvSlsu1WZ82mxGkmO1G%2BuhshpQ%3D&__EVENTVALIDATION=%2FwEWAwLPx%2Fe%2FDAKIpPqvBgKHjILLAWWW9urjdL98sj0%2BNGpoNykbIBrUT3bYERyVSxxNuFUo&ctl00%24ContentPlaceHolder1%24tbXingming=hua&ctl00%24ContentPlaceHolder1%24buChaxun=%E6%9F%A5%E8%AF%A2










   修复方案：  过滤用户输入，post请求也要过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 jamesj@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-10-12 16:40 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给浙江分中心，由浙江分中心后续协调网站管理单位处置。  最新状态： 暂无
